charinfo.name: Temari
charinfo.description: The elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro, Temari is a somewhat cruel and blunt ninja that fights using the wind at her side. With her fan, Temari can create powerful gusts of wind that she can manipulate at her desire.

abilities.name: Cutting Whirlwind
abilities.description: Temari creates a razor sharp wind with her fan that hits one enemy for 20 damage. The following turn, Temari will become invulnerable to all harmful non-mental skills.

abilities.name: Summoning: Quick Beheading Dance
abilities.description: Temari creates a much more massive version of Cutting Whirlwind by summoning the wind weasel Kamatari which deals 35 damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Dust Wind
abilities.description: Temari kicks up dust with her fan, making all her allies invulnerable for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 15 less non-affliction damage.*

abilities.name: Backflip
abilities.description: This skill makes Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.
